amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert an exception for rules made by the Secretary of Homeland Security or any consent decree or settlement made as a result of the rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 113-361 to exempt rules made by the Secretary of Homeland Security, or any consent decree or settlement made as a result of the rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 232 (Roll no. 73).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 232 (Roll no. 73).
